attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1933

Date: 2003-12-03

                     Whereas the Midland Chamber of Commerce, in the Province of Ontario, the certificate of formation of which was recorded under the provisions of the Boards of Trade Act on September 4, 1928, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

                     Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, hereby dissolves as a corporation the Midland Chamber of Commerce.


                     Attendu que la Midland Chamber of Commerce (Ontario), dont le certificat de constitution a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 4 septembre 1928, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

                     À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil dissout la Midland Chamber of Commerce comme personne morale.
